## BaseAnswersConfig interface

The base configuration options for [AnswersCore](./search-core.answerscore.md)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface BaseAnswersConfig 
```

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [endpoints?](./search-core.baseanswersconfig.endpoints.md) | [Endpoints](./search-core.endpoints.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> Overrides for the URLs which are used when making requests to the Answers API. |
|  [experienceKey](./search-core.baseanswersconfig.experiencekey.md) | string | The experience key of the answers experience. |
